<s> in which the printer's devil comes to the door pen in the midst of his revels and enjoyments humble as they were and moderate in cost if not in kind saw an awful sword hanging over him which must drop down before long and put an end to his frolics and feasting <\s>
<s> his money was very nearly spent <\s>
<s> his club subscription had carried away a third part of it <\s>
<s> he had paid for the chief articles of furniture with which he had supplied his little bedroom in fine he was come to the last five pound note in his pocket book and could think of no method of providing a successor for our friend had been bred up like a young prince as yet or as a child in arms whom his mother feeds when it cries out <\s>
<s> warrington did not know what his comrade's means were <\s>
<s> an only child with a mother at her country house and an old dandy of an uncle who dined with a great man every day pen might have a large bank at his command for anything that the other knew <\s>
<s> he had gold chains and a dressing case fit for a lord <\s>
<s> his habits were those of an aristocrat not that he was expensive upon any particular point for he dined and laughed over the pint of porter and the plate of beef from the cook's shop with perfect content and good appetite but he could not adopt the penny wise precautions of life <\s>
<s> he could not give twopence to a waiter he could not refrain from taking a cab if he had a mind to do so or if it rained and as surely as he took the cab he overpaid the driver <\s>
<s> he had a scorn for cleaned gloves and minor economies <\s>
<s> had he been bred to ten thousand a year he could scarcely have been more free handed and for a beggar with a sad story or a couple of pretty piteous faced children he never could resist putting his hand into his pocket <\s>
<s> it was a sumptuous nature perhaps that could not be brought to regard money a natural generosity and kindness and possibly a petty vanity that was pleased with praise even with the praise of waiters and cabmen <\s>
<s> i doubt whether the wisest of us know what our own motives are and whether some of the actions of which we are the very proudest will not surprise us when we trace them as we shall one day to their source <\s>
<s> warrington then did not know and pen had not thought proper to confide to his friend his pecuniary history <\s>
<s> that pen had been wild and wickedly extravagant at college the other was aware everybody at college was extravagant and wild but how great the son's expenses had been and how small the mother's means were points which had not been as yet submitted to mr <\s>
<s> at last the story came out while pen was grimly surveying the change for the last five pound note as it lay upon the tray from the public house by mr <\s>
<s> warrington's pot of ale <\s>
<s> it is the last rose of summer said pen its blooming companions have gone long ago and behold the last one of the garland has shed its leaves and he told warrington the whole story which we know of his mother's means of his own follies of laura's generosity during which time warrington smoked his pipe and listened intent <\s>
<s> impecuniosity will do you good pen's friend said knocking out the ashes at the end of the narration i don't know anything more wholesome for a man for an honest man mind you for another the medicine loses its effect than a state of tick <\s>
<s> it is an alterative and a tonic it keeps your moral man in a perpetual state of excitement as a man who is riding at a fence or has his opponent's single stick before him is forced to look his obstacle steadily in the face and braces himself to repulse or overcome it a little necessity brings out your pluck if you have any and nerves you to grapple with fortune <\s>
<s> you will discover what a number of things you can do without when you have no money to buy them <\s>
<s> you won't want new gloves and varnished boots eau de cologne and cabs to ride in <\s>
<s> you have been bred up as a molly coddle pen and spoilt by the women <\s>
<s> a single man who has health and brains and can't find a livelihood in the world doesn't deserve to stay there <\s>
<s> let him pay his last halfpenny and jump over waterloo bridge <\s>
<s> let him steal a leg of mutton and be transported and get out of the country he is not fit to live in it <\s>
<s> dixi i have spoken <\s>
<s> give us another pull at the pale ale <\s>
<s> you have certainly spoken but how is one to live <\s>
<s> there is beef and bread in plenty in england but you must pay for it with work or money <\s>
<s> and who will take my work <\s>
<s> and what work can i do <\s>
<s> warrington burst out laughing <\s>
<s> suppose we advertise in the times he said for an usher's place at a classical and commercial academy a gentleman b a <\s>
<s> boniface college and who was plucked for his degree confound you cried pen <\s>
<s> wishes to give lessons in classics and mathematics and the rudiments of the french language he can cut hair attend to the younger pupils and play a second on the piano with the daughters of the principal <\s>
<s> p lamb court temple <\s>
<s> go on said pen growling <\s>
<s> men take to all sorts of professions <\s>
<s> why there is your friend bloundell bloundell is a professional blackleg and travels the continent where he picks up young gentlemen of fashion and fleeces them <\s>
<s> there is bob o'toole with whom i was at school who drives the ballynafad mail now and carries honest jack finucane's own correspondence to that city <\s>
<s> i know a man sir a doctor's son like well don't be angry i meant nothing offensive a doctor's son i say who was walking the hospitals here and quarrelled with his governor on questions of finance and what did he do when he came to his last five pound note <\s>
<s> he let his mustachios grow went into a provincial town where he announced himself as professor spineto chiropodist to the emperor of all the russians and by a happy operation on the editor of the country newspaper established himself in practice and lived reputably for three years <\s>
<s> he has been reconciled to his family and has succeeded to his father's gallypots <\s>
<s> hang gallypots cried pen <\s>
<s> i can't drive a coach cut corns or cheat at cards <\s>
<s> there's nothing else you propose <\s>
<s> yes there's our own correspondent warrington said <\s>
<s> every man has his secrets look you <\s>
<s> before you told me the story of your money matters i had no idea but that you were a gentleman of fortune for with your confounded airs and appearance anybody would suppose you to be so <\s>
<s> from what you tell me about your mother's income it is clear that you must not lay any more hands on it <\s>
<s> you can't go on spunging upon the women <\s>
<s> you must pay off that trump of a girl <\s>
<s> laura is her name here is your health laura and carry a hod rather than ask for a shilling from home <\s>
<s> but how earn one <\s>
<s> how do i live think you <\s>
<s> on my younger brother's allowance pendennis <\s>
<s> i have secrets of my own my boy and here warrington's countenance fell <\s>
<s> i made away with that allowance five years ago if i had made away with myself a little time before it would have been better <\s>
<s> i have played off my own bat ever since <\s>
<s> i don't want much money <\s>
<s> when my purse is out i go to work and fill it and then lie idle like a serpent or an indian until i have digested the mass <\s>
<s> look i begin to feel empty warrington said and showed pen a long lean purse with but a few sovereigns at one end of it <\s>
<s> but how do you fill it <\s>
<s> i write said warrington <\s>
<s> i don't tell the world that i do so he added with a blush <\s>
<s> i do not choose that questions should be asked or perhaps i am an ass and don't wish it to be said that george warrington writes for bread <\s>
<s> but i write in the law reviews look here these articles are mine <\s>
<s> and he turned over some sheets <\s>
<s> i write in a newspaper now and then of which a friend of mine is editor <\s>
<s> and warrington going with pendennis to the club one day called for a file of the dawn and pointed with his finger silently to one or two articles which pen read with delight <\s>
<s> he had no difficulty in recognising the style afterwards the strong thoughts and curt periods the sense the satire and the scholarship <\s>
<s> i am not up to this said pen with a genuine admiration of his friend's powers <\s>
<s> i know very little about politics or history warrington and have but a smattering of letters <\s>
<s> i can't fly upon such a wing as yours <\s>
<s> but you can on your own my boy which is lighter and soars higher perhaps the other said good naturedly <\s>
<s> those little scraps and verses which i have seen of yours show me what is rare in these days a natural gift sir <\s>
<s> you needn't blush you conceited young jackanapes <\s>
<s> you have thought so yourself any time these ten years <\s>
<s> you have got the sacred flame a little of the real poetical fire sir i think and all our oil lamps are nothing compared to that though ever so well trimmed <\s>
<s> you are a poet pen my boy and so speaking warrington stretched out his broad hand and clapped pen on the shoulder <\s>
<s> arthur was so delighted that the tears came into his eyes <\s>
<s> how kind you are to me warrington <\s>
<s> i like you old boy said the other <\s>
<s> i was dev'lish lonely in chambers and wanted somebody and the sight of your honest face somehow pleased me <\s>
<s> i liked the way you laughed at lowton that poor good little snob <\s>
<s> and in fine the reason why i cannot tell but so it is young un <\s>
<s> i'm alone in the world sir and i wanted some one to keep me company and a glance of extreme kindness and melancholy passed out of warrington's dark eyes <\s>
<s> pen was too much pleased with his own thoughts to perceive the sadness of the friend who was complimenting him <\s>
<s> thank you warrington he said thank you for your friendship to me and and what you say about me <\s>
<s> i have often thought i was a poet <\s>
<s> i will be one i think i am one as you say so though the world mayn't <\s>
<s> is it is it the ariadne in naxos which you liked i was only eighteen when i wrote it or the prize poem <\s>
<s> warrington burst into a roar of laughter <\s>
<s> why young goose he yelled out of all the miserable weak rubbish i ever tried ariadne in naxos is the most mawkish and disgusting <\s>
<s> the prize poem is so pompous and feeble that i'm positively surprised sir it didn't get the medal <\s>
<s> you don't suppose that you are a serious poet do you and are going to cut out milton and aeschylus <\s>
<s> are you setting up to be a pindar you absurd little tom tit and fancy you have the strength and pinion which the theban eagle bear sailing with supreme dominion through the azure fields of air <\s>
<s> no my boy i think you can write a magazine article and turn a pretty copy of verses that's what i think of you <\s>
<s> said pen bouncing up and stamping his foot i'll show you that i am a better man than you think for <\s>

<s> i have secrets of my own my boy and here warrington's countenance fell <\s>
<s> i made away with that allowance five years ago if i had made away with myself a little time before it would have been better <\s>
<s> i have played off my own bat ever since <\s>
<s> i don't want much money <\s>
<s> when my purse is out i go to work and fill it and then lie idle like a serpent or an indian until i have digested the mass <\s>
<s> look i begin to feel empty warrington said and showed pen a long lean purse with but a few sovereigns at one end of it <\s>
<s> but how do you fill it <\s>
<s> i write said warrington <\s>
<s> i don't tell the world that i do so he added with a blush <\s>
<s> i do not choose that questions should be asked or perhaps i am an ass and don't wish it to be said that george warrington writes for bread <\s>
<s> but i write in the law reviews look here these articles are mine <\s>
<s> and he turned over some sheets <\s>
<s> i write in a newspaper now and then of which a friend of mine is editor <\s>
<s> and warrington going with pendennis to the club one day called for a file of the dawn and pointed with his finger silently to one or two articles which pen read with delight <\s>
<s> he had no difficulty in recognising the style afterwards the strong thoughts and curt periods the sense the satire and the scholarship <\s>
<s> i am not up to this said pen with a genuine admiration of his friend's powers <\s>
<s> i know very little about politics or history warrington and have but a smattering of letters <\s>
<s> i can't fly upon such a wing as yours <\s>
<s> but you can on your own my boy which is lighter and soars higher perhaps the other said good naturedly <\s>
<s> those little scraps and verses which i have seen of yours show me what is rare in these days a natural gift sir <\s>
<s> you needn't blush you conceited young jackanapes <\s>
<s> you have thought so yourself any time these ten years <\s>
<s> you have got the sacred flame a little of the real poetical fire sir i think and all our oil lamps are nothing compared to that though ever so well trimmed <\s>
<s> you are a poet pen my boy and so speaking warrington stretched out his broad hand and clapped pen on the shoulder <\s>
<s> arthur was so delighted that the tears came into his eyes <\s>
<s> how kind you are to me warrington <\s>
<s> i like you old boy said the other <\s>
<s> i was dev'lish lonely in chambers and wanted somebody and the sight of your honest face somehow pleased me <\s>
<s> i liked the way you laughed at lowton that poor good little snob <\s>
<s> and in fine the reason why i cannot tell but so it is young un <\s>
<s> i'm alone in the world sir and i wanted some one to keep me company and a glance of extreme kindness and melancholy passed out of warrington's dark eyes <\s>
<s> pen was too much pleased with his own thoughts to perceive the sadness of the friend who was complimenting him <\s>
<s> thank you warrington he said thank you for your friendship to me and and what you say about me <\s>
<s> i have often thought i was a poet <\s>
<s> i will be one i think i am one as you say so though the world mayn't <\s>
<s> is it is it the ariadne in naxos which you liked i was only eighteen when i wrote it or the prize poem <\s>
<s> warrington burst into a roar of laughter <\s>
<s> why young goose he yelled out of all the miserable weak rubbish i ever tried ariadne in naxos is the most mawkish and disgusting <\s>
<s> the prize poem is so pompous and feeble that i'm positively surprised sir it didn't get the medal <\s>
<s> you don't suppose that you are a serious poet do you and are going to cut out milton and aeschylus <\s>
<s> are you setting up to be a pindar you absurd little tom tit and fancy you have the strength and pinion which the theban eagle bear sailing with supreme dominion through the azure fields of air <\s>
<s> no my boy i think you can write a magazine article and turn a pretty copy of verses that's what i think of you <\s>
<s> said pen bouncing up and stamping his foot i'll show you that i am a better man than you think for <\s>
<s> in which the printer's devil comes to the door pen in the midst of his revels and enjoyments humble as they were and moderate in cost if not in kind saw an awful sword hanging over him which must drop down before long and put an end to his frolics and feasting <\s>
<s> his money was very nearly spent <\s>
<s> his club subscription had carried away a third part of it <\s>
<s> he had paid for the chief articles of furniture with which he had supplied his little bedroom in fine he was come to the last five pound note in his pocket book and could think of no method of providing a successor for our friend had been bred up like a young prince as yet or as a child in arms whom his mother feeds when it cries out <\s>
<s> warrington did not know what his comrade's means were <\s>
<s> an only child with a mother at her country house and an old dandy of an uncle who dined with a great man every day pen might have a large bank at his command for anything that the other knew <\s>
<s> he had gold chains and a dressing case fit for a lord <\s>
<s> his habits were those of an aristocrat not that he was expensive upon any particular point for he dined and laughed over the pint of porter and the plate of beef from the cook's shop with perfect content and good appetite but he could not adopt the penny wise precautions of life <\s>
<s> he could not give twopence to a waiter he could not refrain from taking a cab if he had a mind to do so or if it rained and as surely as he took the cab he overpaid the driver <\s>
<s> he had a scorn for cleaned gloves and minor economies <\s>
<s> had he been bred to ten thousand a year he could scarcely have been more free handed and for a beggar with a sad story or a couple of pretty piteous faced children he never could resist putting his hand into his pocket <\s>
<s> it was a sumptuous nature perhaps that could not be brought to regard money a natural generosity and kindness and possibly a petty vanity that was pleased with praise even with the praise of waiters and cabmen <\s>
<s> i doubt whether the wisest of us know what our own motives are and whether some of the actions of which we are the very proudest will not surprise us when we trace them as we shall one day to their source <\s>
<s> warrington then did not know and pen had not thought proper to confide to his friend his pecuniary history <\s>
<s> that pen had been wild and wickedly extravagant at college the other was aware everybody at college was extravagant and wild but how great the son's expenses had been and how small the mother's means were points which had not been as yet submitted to mr <\s>
<s> at last the story came out while pen was grimly surveying the change for the last five pound note as it lay upon the tray from the public house by mr <\s>
<s> warrington's pot of ale <\s>
<s> it is the last rose of summer said pen its blooming companions have gone long ago and behold the last one of the garland has shed its leaves and he told warrington the whole story which we know of his mother's means of his own follies of laura's generosity during which time warrington smoked his pipe and listened intent <\s>
<s> impecuniosity will do you good pen's friend said knocking out the ashes at the end of the narration i don't know anything more wholesome for a man for an honest man mind you for another the medicine loses its effect than a state of tick <\s>
<s> it is an alterative and a tonic it keeps your moral man in a perpetual state of excitement as a man who is riding at a fence or has his opponent's single stick before him is forced to look his obstacle steadily in the face and braces himself to repulse or overcome it a little necessity brings out your pluck if you have any and nerves you to grapple with fortune <\s>
<s> you will discover what a number of things you can do without when you have no money to buy them <\s>
<s> you won't want new gloves and varnished boots eau de cologne and cabs to ride in <\s>
<s> you have been bred up as a molly coddle pen and spoilt by the women <\s>
<s> a single man who has health and brains and can't find a livelihood in the world doesn't deserve to stay there <\s>
<s> let him pay his last halfpenny and jump over waterloo bridge <\s>
<s> let him steal a leg of mutton and be transported and get out of the country he is not fit to live in it <\s>
<s> dixi i have spoken <\s>
<s> give us another pull at the pale ale <\s>
<s> you have certainly spoken but how is one to live <\s>
<s> there is beef and bread in plenty in england but you must pay for it with work or money <\s>
<s> and who will take my work <\s>
<s> and what work can i do <\s>
<s> warrington burst out laughing <\s>
<s> suppose we advertise in the times he said for an usher's place at a classical and commercial academy a gentleman b a <\s>
<s> boniface college and who was plucked for his degree confound you cried pen <\s>
<s> wishes to give lessons in classics and mathematics and the rudiments of the french language he can cut hair attend to the younger pupils and play a second on the piano with the daughters of the principal <\s>
<s> p lamb court temple <\s>
<s> go on said pen growling <\s>
<s> men take to all sorts of professions <\s>
<s> why there is your friend bloundell bloundell is a professional blackleg and travels the continent where he picks up young gentlemen of fashion and fleeces them <\s>
<s> there is bob o'toole with whom i was at school who drives the ballynafad mail now and carries honest jack finucane's own correspondence to that city <\s>
<s> i know a man sir a doctor's son like well don't be angry i meant nothing offensive a doctor's son i say who was walking the hospitals here and quarrelled with his governor on questions of finance and what did he do when he came to his last five pound note <\s>
<s> he let his mustachios grow went into a provincial town where he announced himself as professor spineto chiropodist to the emperor of all the russians and by a happy operation on the editor of the country newspaper established himself in practice and lived reputably for three years <\s>
<s> he has been reconciled to his family and has succeeded to his father's gallypots <\s>
<s> hang gallypots cried pen <\s>
<s> i can't drive a coach cut corns or cheat at cards <\s>
<s> there's nothing else you propose <\s>
<s> yes there's our own correspondent warrington said <\s>
<s> every man has his secrets look you <\s>
<s> before you told me the story of your money matters i had no idea but that you were a gentleman of fortune for with your confounded airs and appearance anybody would suppose you to be so <\s>
<s> from what you tell me about your mother's income it is clear that you must not lay any more hands on it <\s>
<s> you can't go on spunging upon the women <\s>
<s> you must pay off that trump of a girl <\s>
<s> laura is her name here is your health laura and carry a hod rather than ask for a shilling from home <\s>
<s> but how earn one <\s>

<s> at last the story came out while pen was grimly surveying the change for the last five pound note as it lay upon the tray from the public house by mr <\s>
<s> warrington's pot of ale <\s>
<s> it is the last rose of summer said pen its blooming companions have gone long ago and behold the last one of the garland has shed its leaves and he told warrington the whole story which we know of his mother's means of his own follies of laura's generosity during which time warrington smoked his pipe and listened intent <\s>
<s> impecuniosity will do you good pen's friend said knocking out the ashes at the end of the narration i don't know anything more wholesome for a man for an honest man mind you for another the medicine loses its effect than a state of tick <\s>
<s> it is an alterative and a tonic it keeps your moral man in a perpetual state of excitement as a man who is riding at a fence or has his opponent's single stick before him is forced to look his obstacle steadily in the face and braces himself to repulse or overcome it a little necessity brings out your pluck if you have any and nerves you to grapple with fortune <\s>
<s> you will discover what a number of things you can do without when you have no money to buy them <\s>
<s> you won't want new gloves and varnished boots eau de cologne and cabs to ride in <\s>
<s> you have been bred up as a molly coddle pen and spoilt by the women <\s>
<s> a single man who has health and brains and can't find a livelihood in the world doesn't deserve to stay there <\s>
<s> let him pay his last halfpenny and jump over waterloo bridge <\s>
<s> let him steal a leg of mutton and be transported and get out of the country he is not fit to live in it <\s>
<s> dixi i have spoken <\s>
<s> give us another pull at the pale ale <\s>
<s> you have certainly spoken but how is one to live <\s>
<s> there is beef and bread in plenty in england but you must pay for it with work or money <\s>
<s> and who will take my work <\s>
<s> and what work can i do <\s>
<s> warrington burst out laughing <\s>
<s> suppose we advertise in the times he said for an usher's place at a classical and commercial academy a gentleman b a <\s>
<s> boniface college and who was plucked for his degree confound you cried pen <\s>
<s> wishes to give lessons in classics and mathematics and the rudiments of the french language he can cut hair attend to the younger pupils and play a second on the piano with the daughters of the principal <\s>
<s> p lamb court temple <\s>
<s> go on said pen growling <\s>
<s> men take to all sorts of professions <\s>
<s> why there is your friend bloundell bloundell is a professional blackleg and travels the continent where he picks up young gentlemen of fashion and fleeces them <\s>
<s> there is bob o'toole with whom i was at school who drives the ballynafad mail now and carries honest jack finucane's own correspondence to that city <\s>
<s> i know a man sir a doctor's son like well don't be angry i meant nothing offensive a doctor's son i say who was walking the hospitals here and quarrelled with his governor on questions of finance and what did he do when he came to his last five pound note <\s>
<s> he let his mustachios grow went into a provincial town where he announced himself as professor spineto chiropodist to the emperor of all the russians and by a happy operation on the editor of the country newspaper established himself in practice and lived reputably for three years <\s>
<s> he has been reconciled to his family and has succeeded to his father's gallypots <\s>
<s> hang gallypots cried pen <\s>
<s> i can't drive a coach cut corns or cheat at cards <\s>
<s> there's nothing else you propose <\s>
<s> yes there's our own correspondent warrington said <\s>
<s> every man has his secrets look you <\s>
<s> before you told me the story of your money matters i had no idea but that you were a gentleman of fortune for with your confounded airs and appearance anybody would suppose you to be so <\s>
<s> from what you tell me about your mother's income it is clear that you must not lay any more hands on it <\s>
<s> you can't go on spunging upon the women <\s>
<s> you must pay off that trump of a girl <\s>
<s> laura is her name here is your health laura and carry a hod rather than ask for a shilling from home <\s>
<s> but how earn one <\s>
<s> how do i live think you <\s>
<s> on my younger brother's allowance pendennis <\s>
<s> i have secrets of my own my boy and here warrington's countenance fell <\s>
<s> i made away with that allowance five years ago if i had made away with myself a little time before it would have been better <\s>
<s> i have played off my own bat ever since <\s>
<s> i don't want much money <\s>
<s> when my purse is out i go to work and fill it and then lie idle like a serpent or an indian until i have digested the mass <\s>
<s> look i begin to feel empty warrington said and showed pen a long lean purse with but a few sovereigns at one end of it <\s>
<s> but how do you fill it <\s>
<s> i write said warrington <\s>
<s> i don't tell the world that i do so he added with a blush <\s>
<s> i do not choose that questions should be asked or perhaps i am an ass and don't wish it to be said that george warrington writes for bread <\s>
<s> but i write in the law reviews look here these articles are mine <\s>
<s> and he turned over some sheets <\s>
<s> i write in a newspaper now and then of which a friend of mine is editor <\s>
<s> and warrington going with pendennis to the club one day called for a file of the dawn and pointed with his finger silently to one or two articles which pen read with delight <\s>
<s> he had no difficulty in recognising the style afterwards the strong thoughts and curt periods the sense the satire and the scholarship <\s>
<s> i am not up to this said pen with a genuine admiration of his friend's powers <\s>
<s> i know very little about politics or history warrington and have but a smattering of letters <\s>
<s> i can't fly upon such a wing as yours <\s>
<s> but you can on your own my boy which is lighter and soars higher perhaps the other said good naturedly <\s>
<s> those little scraps and verses which i have seen of yours show me what is rare in these days a natural gift sir <\s>
<s> you needn't blush you conceited young jackanapes <\s>
<s> you have thought so yourself any time these ten years <\s>
<s> you have got the sacred flame a little of the real poetical fire sir i think and all our oil lamps are nothing compared to that though ever so well trimmed <\s>
<s> you are a poet pen my boy and so speaking warrington stretched out his broad hand and clapped pen on the shoulder <\s>
<s> arthur was so delighted that the tears came into his eyes <\s>
<s> how kind you are to me warrington <\s>
<s> i like you old boy said the other <\s>
<s> i was dev'lish lonely in chambers and wanted somebody and the sight of your honest face somehow pleased me <\s>
<s> i liked the way you laughed at lowton that poor good little snob <\s>
<s> and in fine the reason why i cannot tell but so it is young un <\s>
<s> i'm alone in the world sir and i wanted some one to keep me company and a glance of extreme kindness and melancholy passed out of warrington's dark eyes <\s>
<s> pen was too much pleased with his own thoughts to perceive the sadness of the friend who was complimenting him <\s>
<s> thank you warrington he said thank you for your friendship to me and and what you say about me <\s>
<s> i have often thought i was a poet <\s>
<s> i will be one i think i am one as you say so though the world mayn't <\s>
<s> is it is it the ariadne in naxos which you liked i was only eighteen when i wrote it or the prize poem <\s>
<s> warrington burst into a roar of laughter <\s>
<s> why young goose he yelled out of all the miserable weak rubbish i ever tried ariadne in naxos is the most mawkish and disgusting <\s>
<s> the prize poem is so pompous and feeble that i'm positively surprised sir it didn't get the medal <\s>
<s> you don't suppose that you are a serious poet do you and are going to cut out milton and aeschylus <\s>
<s> are you setting up to be a pindar you absurd little tom tit and fancy you have the strength and pinion which the theban eagle bear sailing with supreme dominion through the azure fields of air <\s>
<s> no my boy i think you can write a magazine article and turn a pretty copy of verses that's what i think of you <\s>
<s> said pen bouncing up and stamping his foot i'll show you that i am a better man than you think for <\s>
<s> in which the printer's devil comes to the door pen in the midst of his revels and enjoyments humble as they were and moderate in cost if not in kind saw an awful sword hanging over him which must drop down before long and put an end to his frolics and feasting <\s>
<s> his money was very nearly spent <\s>
<s> his club subscription had carried away a third part of it <\s>
<s> he had paid for the chief articles of furniture with which he had supplied his little bedroom in fine he was come to the last five pound note in his pocket book and could think of no method of providing a successor for our friend had been bred up like a young prince as yet or as a child in arms whom his mother feeds when it cries out <\s>
<s> warrington did not know what his comrade's means were <\s>
<s> an only child with a mother at her country house and an old dandy of an uncle who dined with a great man every day pen might have a large bank at his command for anything that the other knew <\s>
<s> he had gold chains and a dressing case fit for a lord <\s>
<s> his habits were those of an aristocrat not that he was expensive upon any particular point for he dined and laughed over the pint of porter and the plate of beef from the cook's shop with perfect content and good appetite but he could not adopt the penny wise precautions of life <\s>
<s> he could not give twopence to a waiter he could not refrain from taking a cab if he had a mind to do so or if it rained and as surely as he took the cab he overpaid the driver <\s>
<s> he had a scorn for cleaned gloves and minor economies <\s>
<s> had he been bred to ten thousand a year he could scarcely have been more free handed and for a beggar with a sad story or a couple of pretty piteous faced children he never could resist putting his hand into his pocket <\s>
<s> it was a sumptuous nature perhaps that could not be brought to regard money a natural generosity and kindness and possibly a petty vanity that was pleased with praise even with the praise of waiters and cabmen <\s>
<s> i doubt whether the wisest of us know what our own motives are and whether some of the actions of which we are the very proudest will not surprise us when we trace them as we shall one day to their source <\s>
<s> warrington then did not know and pen had not thought proper to confide to his friend his pecuniary history <\s>

<s> you have got the sacred flame a little of the real poetical fire sir i think and all our oil lamps are nothing compared to that though ever so well trimmed <\s>
<s> you are a poet pen my boy and so speaking warrington stretched out his broad hand and clapped pen on the shoulder <\s>
<s> arthur was so delighted that the tears came into his eyes <\s>
<s> how kind you are to me warrington <\s>
<s> i like you old boy said the other <\s>
<s> i was dev'lish lonely in chambers and wanted somebody and the sight of your honest face somehow pleased me <\s>
<s> i liked the way you laughed at lowton that poor good little snob <\s>
<s> and in fine the reason why i cannot tell but so it is young un <\s>
<s> i'm alone in the world sir and i wanted some one to keep me company and a glance of extreme kindness and melancholy passed out of warrington's dark eyes <\s>
<s> pen was too much pleased with his own thoughts to perceive the sadness of the friend who was complimenting him <\s>
<s> thank you warrington he said thank you for your friendship to me and and what you say about me <\s>
<s> i have often thought i was a poet <\s>
<s> i will be one i think i am one as you say so though the world mayn't <\s>
<s> is it is it the ariadne in naxos which you liked i was only eighteen when i wrote it or the prize poem <\s>
<s> warrington burst into a roar of laughter <\s>
<s> why young goose he yelled out of all the miserable weak rubbish i ever tried ariadne in naxos is the most mawkish and disgusting <\s>
<s> the prize poem is so pompous and feeble that i'm positively surprised sir it didn't get the medal <\s>
<s> you don't suppose that you are a serious poet do you and are going to cut out milton and aeschylus <\s>
<s> are you setting up to be a pindar you absurd little tom tit and fancy you have the strength and pinion which the theban eagle bear sailing with supreme dominion through the azure fields of air <\s>
<s> no my boy i think you can write a magazine article and turn a pretty copy of verses that's what i think of you <\s>
<s> said pen bouncing up and stamping his foot i'll show you that i am a better man than you think for <\s>
<s> in which the printer's devil comes to the door pen in the midst of his revels and enjoyments humble as they were and moderate in cost if not in kind saw an awful sword hanging over him which must drop down before long and put an end to his frolics and feasting <\s>
<s> his money was very nearly spent <\s>
<s> his club subscription had carried away a third part of it <\s>
<s> he had paid for the chief articles of furniture with which he had supplied his little bedroom in fine he was come to the last five pound note in his pocket book and could think of no method of providing a successor for our friend had been bred up like a young prince as yet or as a child in arms whom his mother feeds when it cries out <\s>
<s> warrington did not know what his comrade's means were <\s>
<s> an only child with a mother at her country house and an old dandy of an uncle who dined with a great man every day pen might have a large bank at his command for anything that the other knew <\s>
<s> he had gold chains and a dressing case fit for a lord <\s>
<s> his habits were those of an aristocrat not that he was expensive upon any particular point for he dined and laughed over the pint of porter and the plate of beef from the cook's shop with perfect content and good appetite but he could not adopt the penny wise precautions of life <\s>
<s> he could not give twopence to a waiter he could not refrain from taking a cab if he had a mind to do so or if it rained and as surely as he took the cab he overpaid the driver <\s>
<s> he had a scorn for cleaned gloves and minor economies <\s>
<s> had he been bred to ten thousand a year he could scarcely have been more free handed and for a beggar with a sad story or a couple of pretty piteous faced children he never could resist putting his hand into his pocket <\s>
<s> it was a sumptuous nature perhaps that could not be brought to regard money a natural generosity and kindness and possibly a petty vanity that was pleased with praise even with the praise of waiters and cabmen <\s>
<s> i doubt whether the wisest of us know what our own motives are and whether some of the actions of which we are the very proudest will not surprise us when we trace them as we shall one day to their source <\s>
<s> warrington then did not know and pen had not thought proper to confide to his friend his pecuniary history <\s>
<s> that pen had been wild and wickedly extravagant at college the other was aware everybody at college was extravagant and wild but how great the son's expenses had been and how small the mother's means were points which had not been as yet submitted to mr <\s>
<s> at last the story came out while pen was grimly surveying the change for the last five pound note as it lay upon the tray from the public house by mr <\s>
<s> warrington's pot of ale <\s>
<s> it is the last rose of summer said pen its blooming companions have gone long ago and behold the last one of the garland has shed its leaves and he told warrington the whole story which we know of his mother's means of his own follies of laura's generosity during which time warrington smoked his pipe and listened intent <\s>
<s> impecuniosity will do you good pen's friend said knocking out the ashes at the end of the narration i don't know anything more wholesome for a man for an honest man mind you for another the medicine loses its effect than a state of tick <\s>
<s> it is an alterative and a tonic it keeps your moral man in a perpetual state of excitement as a man who is riding at a fence or has his opponent's single stick before him is forced to look his obstacle steadily in the face and braces himself to repulse or overcome it a little necessity brings out your pluck if you have any and nerves you to grapple with fortune <\s>
<s> you will discover what a number of things you can do without when you have no money to buy them <\s>
<s> you won't want new gloves and varnished boots eau de cologne and cabs to ride in <\s>
<s> you have been bred up as a molly coddle pen and spoilt by the women <\s>
<s> a single man who has health and brains and can't find a livelihood in the world doesn't deserve to stay there <\s>
<s> let him pay his last halfpenny and jump over waterloo bridge <\s>
<s> let him steal a leg of mutton and be transported and get out of the country he is not fit to live in it <\s>
<s> dixi i have spoken <\s>
<s> give us another pull at the pale ale <\s>
<s> you have certainly spoken but how is one to live <\s>
<s> there is beef and bread in plenty in england but you must pay for it with work or money <\s>
<s> and who will take my work <\s>
<s> and what work can i do <\s>
<s> warrington burst out laughing <\s>
<s> suppose we advertise in the times he said for an usher's place at a classical and commercial academy a gentleman b a <\s>
<s> boniface college and who was plucked for his degree confound you cried pen <\s>
<s> wishes to give lessons in classics and mathematics and the rudiments of the french language he can cut hair attend to the younger pupils and play a second on the piano with the daughters of the principal <\s>
<s> p lamb court temple <\s>
<s> go on said pen growling <\s>
<s> men take to all sorts of professions <\s>
<s> why there is your friend bloundell bloundell is a professional blackleg and travels the continent where he picks up young gentlemen of fashion and fleeces them <\s>
<s> there is bob o'toole with whom i was at school who drives the ballynafad mail now and carries honest jack finucane's own correspondence to that city <\s>
<s> i know a man sir a doctor's son like well don't be angry i meant nothing offensive a doctor's son i say who was walking the hospitals here and quarrelled with his governor on questions of finance and what did he do when he came to his last five pound note <\s>
<s> he let his mustachios grow went into a provincial town where he announced himself as professor spineto chiropodist to the emperor of all the russians and by a happy operation on the editor of the country newspaper established himself in practice and lived reputably for three years <\s>
<s> he has been reconciled to his family and has succeeded to his father's gallypots <\s>
<s> hang gallypots cried pen <\s>
<s> i can't drive a coach cut corns or cheat at cards <\s>
<s> there's nothing else you propose <\s>
<s> yes there's our own correspondent warrington said <\s>
<s> every man has his secrets look you <\s>
<s> before you told me the story of your money matters i had no idea but that you were a gentleman of fortune for with your confounded airs and appearance anybody would suppose you to be so <\s>
<s> from what you tell me about your mother's income it is clear that you must not lay any more hands on it <\s>
<s> you can't go on spunging upon the women <\s>
<s> you must pay off that trump of a girl <\s>
<s> laura is her name here is your health laura and carry a hod rather than ask for a shilling from home <\s>
<s> but how earn one <\s>
<s> how do i live think you <\s>
<s> on my younger brother's allowance pendennis <\s>
<s> i have secrets of my own my boy and here warrington's countenance fell <\s>
<s> i made away with that allowance five years ago if i had made away with myself a little time before it would have been better <\s>
<s> i have played off my own bat ever since <\s>
<s> i don't want much money <\s>
<s> when my purse is out i go to work and fill it and then lie idle like a serpent or an indian until i have digested the mass <\s>
<s> look i begin to feel empty warrington said and showed pen a long lean purse with but a few sovereigns at one end of it <\s>
<s> but how do you fill it <\s>
<s> i write said warrington <\s>
<s> i don't tell the world that i do so he added with a blush <\s>
<s> i do not choose that questions should be asked or perhaps i am an ass and don't wish it to be said that george warrington writes for bread <\s>
<s> but i write in the law reviews look here these articles are mine <\s>
<s> and he turned over some sheets <\s>
<s> i write in a newspaper now and then of which a friend of mine is editor <\s>
<s> and warrington going with pendennis to the club one day called for a file of the dawn and pointed with his finger silently to one or two articles which pen read with delight <\s>
<s> he had no difficulty in recognising the style afterwards the strong thoughts and curt periods the sense the satire and the scholarship <\s>
<s> i am not up to this said pen with a genuine admiration of his friend's powers <\s>
<s> i know very little about politics or history warrington and have but a smattering of letters <\s>
<s> i can't fly upon such a wing as yours <\s>
<s> but you can on your own my boy which is lighter and soars higher perhaps the other said good naturedly <\s>
<s> those little scraps and verses which i have seen of yours show me what is rare in these days a natural gift sir <\s>
<s> you needn't blush you conceited young jackanapes <\s>
<s> you have thought so yourself any time these ten years <\s>
<s> you have got the sacred flame a little of the real poetical fire sir i think and all our oil lamps are nothing compared to that though ever so well trimmed <\s>

<s> suppose we advertise in the times he said for an usher's place at a classical and commercial academy a gentleman b a <\s>
<s> boniface college and who was plucked for his degree confound you cried pen <\s>
<s> wishes to give lessons in classics and mathematics and the rudiments of the french language he can cut hair attend to the younger pupils and play a second on the piano with the daughters of the principal <\s>
<s> p lamb court temple <\s>
<s> go on said pen growling <\s>
<s> men take to all sorts of professions <\s>
<s> why there is your friend bloundell bloundell is a professional blackleg and travels the continent where he picks up young gentlemen of fashion and fleeces them <\s>
<s> there is bob o'toole with whom i was at school who drives the ballynafad mail now and carries honest jack finucane's own correspondence to that city <\s>
<s> i know a man sir a doctor's son like well don't be angry i meant nothing offensive a doctor's son i say who was walking the hospitals here and quarrelled with his governor on questions of finance and what did he do when he came to his last five pound note <\s>
<s> he let his mustachios grow went into a provincial town where he announced himself as professor spineto chiropodist to the emperor of all the russians and by a happy operation on the editor of the country newspaper established himself in practice and lived reputably for three years <\s>
<s> he has been reconciled to his family and has succeeded to his father's gallypots <\s>
<s> hang gallypots cried pen <\s>
<s> i can't drive a coach cut corns or cheat at cards <\s>
<s> there's nothing else you propose <\s>
<s> yes there's our own correspondent warrington said <\s>
<s> every man has his secrets look you <\s>
<s> before you told me the story of your money matters i had no idea but that you were a gentleman of fortune for with your confounded airs and appearance anybody would suppose you to be so <\s>
<s> from what you tell me about your mother's income it is clear that you must not lay any more hands on it <\s>
<s> you can't go on spunging upon the women <\s>
<s> you must pay off that trump of a girl <\s>
<s> laura is her name here is your health laura and carry a hod rather than ask for a shilling from home <\s>
<s> but how earn one <\s>
<s> how do i live think you <\s>
<s> on my younger brother's allowance pendennis <\s>
<s> i have secrets of my own my boy and here warrington's countenance fell <\s>
<s> i made away with that allowance five years ago if i had made away with myself a little time before it would have been better <\s>
<s> i have played off my own bat ever since <\s>
<s> i don't want much money <\s>
<s> when my purse is out i go to work and fill it and then lie idle like a serpent or an indian until i have digested the mass <\s>
<s> look i begin to feel empty warrington said and showed pen a long lean purse with but a few sovereigns at one end of it <\s>
<s> but how do you fill it <\s>
<s> i write said warrington <\s>
<s> i don't tell the world that i do so he added with a blush <\s>
<s> i do not choose that questions should be asked or perhaps i am an ass and don't wish it to be said that george warrington writes for bread <\s>
<s> but i write in the law reviews look here these articles are mine <\s>
<s> and he turned over some sheets <\s>
<s> i write in a newspaper now and then of which a friend of mine is editor <\s>
<s> and warrington going with pendennis to the club one day called for a file of the dawn and pointed with his finger silently to one or two articles which pen read with delight <\s>
<s> he had no difficulty in recognising the style afterwards the strong thoughts and curt periods the sense the satire and the scholarship <\s>
<s> i am not up to this said pen with a genuine admiration of his friend's powers <\s>
<s> i know very little about politics or history warrington and have but a smattering of letters <\s>
<s> i can't fly upon such a wing as yours <\s>
<s> but you can on your own my boy which is lighter and soars higher perhaps the other said good naturedly <\s>
<s> those little scraps and verses which i have seen of yours show me what is rare in these days a natural gift sir <\s>
<s> you needn't blush you conceited young jackanapes <\s>
<s> you have thought so yourself any time these ten years <\s>
<s> you have got the sacred flame a little of the real poetical fire sir i think and all our oil lamps are nothing compared to that though ever so well trimmed <\s>
<s> you are a poet pen my boy and so speaking warrington stretched out his broad hand and clapped pen on the shoulder <\s>
<s> arthur was so delighted that the tears came into his eyes <\s>
<s> how kind you are to me warrington <\s>
<s> i like you old boy said the other <\s>
<s> i was dev'lish lonely in chambers and wanted somebody and the sight of your honest face somehow pleased me <\s>
<s> i liked the way you laughed at lowton that poor good little snob <\s>
<s> and in fine the reason why i cannot tell but so it is young un <\s>
<s> i'm alone in the world sir and i wanted some one to keep me company and a glance of extreme kindness and melancholy passed out of warrington's dark eyes <\s>
<s> pen was too much pleased with his own thoughts to perceive the sadness of the friend who was complimenting him <\s>
<s> thank you warrington he said thank you for your friendship to me and and what you say about me <\s>
<s> i have often thought i was a poet <\s>
<s> i will be one i think i am one as you say so though the world mayn't <\s>
<s> is it is it the ariadne in naxos which you liked i was only eighteen when i wrote it or the prize poem <\s>
<s> warrington burst into a roar of laughter <\s>
<s> why young goose he yelled out of all the miserable weak rubbish i ever tried ariadne in naxos is the most mawkish and disgusting <\s>
<s> the prize poem is so pompous and feeble that i'm positively surprised sir it didn't get the medal <\s>
<s> you don't suppose that you are a serious poet do you and are going to cut out milton and aeschylus <\s>
<s> are you setting up to be a pindar you absurd little tom tit and fancy you have the strength and pinion which the theban eagle bear sailing with supreme dominion through the azure fields of air <\s>
<s> no my boy i think you can write a magazine article and turn a pretty copy of verses that's what i think of you <\s>
<s> said pen bouncing up and stamping his foot i'll show you that i am a better man than you think for <\s>
<s> in which the printer's devil comes to the door pen in the midst of his revels and enjoyments humble as they were and moderate in cost if not in kind saw an awful sword hanging over him which must drop down before long and put an end to his frolics and feasting <\s>
<s> his money was very nearly spent <\s>
<s> his club subscription had carried away a third part of it <\s>
<s> he had paid for the chief articles of furniture with which he had supplied his little bedroom in fine he was come to the last five pound note in his pocket book and could think of no method of providing a successor for our friend had been bred up like a young prince as yet or as a child in arms whom his mother feeds when it cries out <\s>
<s> warrington did not know what his comrade's means were <\s>
<s> an only child with a mother at her country house and an old dandy of an uncle who dined with a great man every day pen might have a large bank at his command for anything that the other knew <\s>
<s> he had gold chains and a dressing case fit for a lord <\s>
<s> his habits were those of an aristocrat not that he was expensive upon any particular point for he dined and laughed over the pint of porter and the plate of beef from the cook's shop with perfect content and good appetite but he could not adopt the penny wise precautions of life <\s>
<s> he could not give twopence to a waiter he could not refrain from taking a cab if he had a mind to do so or if it rained and as surely as he took the cab he overpaid the driver <\s>
<s> he had a scorn for cleaned gloves and minor economies <\s>
<s> had he been bred to ten thousand a year he could scarcely have been more free handed and for a beggar with a sad story or a couple of pretty piteous faced children he never could resist putting his hand into his pocket <\s>
<s> it was a sumptuous nature perhaps that could not be brought to regard money a natural generosity and kindness and possibly a petty vanity that was pleased with praise even with the praise of waiters and cabmen <\s>
<s> i doubt whether the wisest of us know what our own motives are and whether some of the actions of which we are the very proudest will not surprise us when we trace them as we shall one day to their source <\s>
<s> warrington then did not know and pen had not thought proper to confide to his friend his pecuniary history <\s>
<s> that pen had been wild and wickedly extravagant at college the other was aware everybody at college was extravagant and wild but how great the son's expenses had been and how small the mother's means were points which had not been as yet submitted to mr <\s>
<s> at last the story came out while pen was grimly surveying the change for the last five pound note as it lay upon the tray from the public house by mr <\s>
<s> warrington's pot of ale <\s>
<s> it is the last rose of summer said pen its blooming companions have gone long ago and behold the last one of the garland has shed its leaves and he told warrington the whole story which we know of his mother's means of his own follies of laura's generosity during which time warrington smoked his pipe and listened intent <\s>
<s> impecuniosity will do you good pen's friend said knocking out the ashes at the end of the narration i don't know anything more wholesome for a man for an honest man mind you for another the medicine loses its effect than a state of tick <\s>
<s> it is an alterative and a tonic it keeps your moral man in a perpetual state of excitement as a man who is riding at a fence or has his opponent's single stick before him is forced to look his obstacle steadily in the face and braces himself to repulse or overcome it a little necessity brings out your pluck if you have any and nerves you to grapple with fortune <\s>
<s> you will discover what a number of things you can do without when you have no money to buy them <\s>
<s> you won't want new gloves and varnished boots eau de cologne and cabs to ride in <\s>
<s> you have been bred up as a molly coddle pen and spoilt by the women <\s>
<s> a single man who has health and brains and can't find a livelihood in the world doesn't deserve to stay there <\s>
<s> let him pay his last halfpenny and jump over waterloo bridge <\s>
<s> let him steal a leg of mutton and be transported and get out of the country he is not fit to live in it <\s>
<s> dixi i have spoken <\s>
<s> give us another pull at the pale ale <\s>
<s> you have certainly spoken but how is one to live <\s>
<s> there is beef and bread in plenty in england but you must pay for it with work or money <\s>
<s> and who will take my work <\s>
<s> and what work can i do <\s>

<s> in which the printer's devil comes to the door pen in the midst of his revels and enjoyments humble as they were and moderate in cost if not in kind saw an awful sword hanging over him which must drop down before long and put an end to his frolics and feasting <\s>
<s> his money was very nearly spent <\s>
<s> his club subscription had carried away a third part of it <\s>
<s> he had paid for the chief articles of furniture with which he had supplied his little bedroom in fine he was come to the last five pound note in his pocket book and could think of no method of providing a successor for our friend had been bred up like a young prince as yet or as a child in arms whom his mother feeds when it cries out <\s>
<s> warrington did not know what his comrade's means were <\s>
<s> an only child with a mother at her country house and an old dandy of an uncle who dined with a great man every day pen might have a large bank at his command for anything that the other knew <\s>
<s> he had gold chains and a dressing case fit for a lord <\s>
<s> his habits were those of an aristocrat not that he was expensive upon any particular point for he dined and laughed over the pint of porter and the plate of beef from the cook's shop with perfect content and good appetite but he could not adopt the penny wise precautions of life <\s>
<s> he could not give twopence to a waiter he could not refrain from taking a cab if he had a mind to do so or if it rained and as surely as he took the cab he overpaid the driver <\s>
<s> he had a scorn for cleaned gloves and minor economies <\s>
<s> had he been bred to ten thousand a year he could scarcely have been more free handed and for a beggar with a sad story or a couple of pretty piteous faced children he never could resist putting his hand into his pocket <\s>
<s> it was a sumptuous nature perhaps that could not be brought to regard money a natural generosity and kindness and possibly a petty vanity that was pleased with praise even with the praise of waiters and cabmen <\s>
<s> i doubt whether the wisest of us know what our own motives are and whether some of the actions of which we are the very proudest will not surprise us when we trace them as we shall one day to their source <\s>
<s> warrington then did not know and pen had not thought proper to confide to his friend his pecuniary history <\s>
<s> that pen had been wild and wickedly extravagant at college the other was aware everybody at college was extravagant and wild but how great the son's expenses had been and how small the mother's means were points which had not been as yet submitted to mr <\s>
<s> at last the story came out while pen was grimly surveying the change for the last five pound note as it lay upon the tray from the public house by mr <\s>
<s> warrington's pot of ale <\s>
<s> it is the last rose of summer said pen its blooming companions have gone long ago and behold the last one of the garland has shed its leaves and he told warrington the whole story which we know of his mother's means of his own follies of laura's generosity during which time warrington smoked his pipe and listened intent <\s>
<s> impecuniosity will do you good pen's friend said knocking out the ashes at the end of the narration i don't know anything more wholesome for a man for an honest man mind you for another the medicine loses its effect than a state of tick <\s>
<s> it is an alterative and a tonic it keeps your moral man in a perpetual state of excitement as a man who is riding at a fence or has his opponent's single stick before him is forced to look his obstacle steadily in the face and braces himself to repulse or overcome it a little necessity brings out your pluck if you have any and nerves you to grapple with fortune <\s>
<s> you will discover what a number of things you can do without when you have no money to buy them <\s>
<s> you won't want new gloves and varnished boots eau de cologne and cabs to ride in <\s>
<s> you have been bred up as a molly coddle pen and spoilt by the women <\s>
<s> a single man who has health and brains and can't find a livelihood in the world doesn't deserve to stay there <\s>
<s> let him pay his last halfpenny and jump over waterloo bridge <\s>
<s> let him steal a leg of mutton and be transported and get out of the country he is not fit to live in it <\s>
<s> dixi i have spoken <\s>
<s> give us another pull at the pale ale <\s>
<s> you have certainly spoken but how is one to live <\s>
<s> there is beef and bread in plenty in england but you must pay for it with work or money <\s>
<s> and who will take my work <\s>
<s> and what work can i do <\s>
<s> warrington burst out laughing <\s>
<s> suppose we advertise in the times he said for an usher's place at a classical and commercial academy a gentleman b a <\s>
<s> boniface college and who was plucked for his degree confound you cried pen <\s>
<s> wishes to give lessons in classics and mathematics and the rudiments of the french language he can cut hair attend to the younger pupils and play a second on the piano with the daughters of the principal <\s>
<s> p lamb court temple <\s>
<s> go on said pen growling <\s>
<s> men take to all sorts of professions <\s>
<s> why there is your friend bloundell bloundell is a professional blackleg and travels the continent where he picks up young gentlemen of fashion and fleeces them <\s>
<s> there is bob o'toole with whom i was at school who drives the ballynafad mail now and carries honest jack finucane's own correspondence to that city <\s>
<s> i know a man sir a doctor's son like well don't be angry i meant nothing offensive a doctor's son i say who was walking the hospitals here and quarrelled with his governor on questions of finance and what did he do when he came to his last five pound note <\s>
<s> he let his mustachios grow went into a provincial town where he announced himself as professor spineto chiropodist to the emperor of all the russians and by a happy operation on the editor of the country newspaper established himself in practice and lived reputably for three years <\s>
<s> he has been reconciled to his family and has succeeded to his father's gallypots <\s>
<s> hang gallypots cried pen <\s>
<s> i can't drive a coach cut corns or cheat at cards <\s>
<s> there's nothing else you propose <\s>
<s> yes there's our own correspondent warrington said <\s>
<s> every man has his secrets look you <\s>
<s> before you told me the story of your money matters i had no idea but that you were a gentleman of fortune for with your confounded airs and appearance anybody would suppose you to be so <\s>
<s> from what you tell me about your mother's income it is clear that you must not lay any more hands on it <\s>
<s> you can't go on spunging upon the women <\s>
<s> you must pay off that trump of a girl <\s>
<s> laura is her name here is your health laura and carry a hod rather than ask for a shilling from home <\s>
<s> but how earn one <\s>
<s> how do i live think you <\s>
<s> on my younger brother's allowance pendennis <\s>
<s> i have secrets of my own my boy and here warrington's countenance fell <\s>
<s> i made away with that allowance five years ago if i had made away with myself a little time before it would have been better <\s>
<s> i have played off my own bat ever since <\s>
<s> i don't want much money <\s>
<s> when my purse is out i go to work and fill it and then lie idle like a serpent or an indian until i have digested the mass <\s>
<s> look i begin to feel empty warrington said and showed pen a long lean purse with but a few sovereigns at one end of it <\s>
<s> but how do you fill it <\s>
<s> i write said warrington <\s>
<s> i don't tell the world that i do so he added with a blush <\s>
<s> i do not choose that questions should be asked or perhaps i am an ass and don't wish it to be said that george warrington writes for bread <\s>
<s> but i write in the law reviews look here these articles are mine <\s>
<s> and he turned over some sheets <\s>
<s> i write in a newspaper now and then of which a friend of mine is editor <\s>
<s> and warrington going with pendennis to the club one day called for a file of the dawn and pointed with his finger silently to one or two articles which pen read with delight <\s>
<s> he had no difficulty in recognising the style afterwards the strong thoughts and curt periods the sense the satire and the scholarship <\s>
<s> i am not up to this said pen with a genuine admiration of his friend's powers <\s>
<s> i know very little about politics or history warrington and have but a smattering of letters <\s>
<s> i can't fly upon such a wing as yours <\s>
<s> but you can on your own my boy which is lighter and soars higher perhaps the other said good naturedly <\s>
<s> those little scraps and verses which i have seen of yours show me what is rare in these days a natural gift sir <\s>
<s> you needn't blush you conceited young jackanapes <\s>
<s> you have thought so yourself any time these ten years <\s>
<s> you have got the sacred flame a little of the real poetical fire sir i think and all our oil lamps are nothing compared to that though ever so well trimmed <\s>
<s> you are a poet pen my boy and so speaking warrington stretched out his broad hand and clapped pen on the shoulder <\s>
<s> arthur was so delighted that the tears came into his eyes <\s>
<s> how kind you are to me warrington <\s>
<s> i like you old boy said the other <\s>
<s> i was dev'lish lonely in chambers and wanted somebody and the sight of your honest face somehow pleased me <\s>
<s> i liked the way you laughed at lowton that poor good little snob <\s>
<s> and in fine the reason why i cannot tell but so it is young un <\s>
<s> i'm alone in the world sir and i wanted some one to keep me company and a glance of extreme kindness and melancholy passed out of warrington's dark eyes <\s>
<s> pen was too much pleased with his own thoughts to perceive the sadness of the friend who was complimenting him <\s>
<s> thank you warrington he said thank you for your friendship to me and and what you say about me <\s>
<s> i have often thought i was a poet <\s>
<s> i will be one i think i am one as you say so though the world mayn't <\s>
<s> is it is it the ariadne in naxos which you liked i was only eighteen when i wrote it or the prize poem <\s>
<s> warrington burst into a roar of laughter <\s>
<s> why young goose he yelled out of all the miserable weak rubbish i ever tried ariadne in naxos is the most mawkish and disgusting <\s>
<s> the prize poem is so pompous and feeble that i'm positively surprised sir it didn't get the medal <\s>
<s> you don't suppose that you are a serious poet do you and are going to cut out milton and aeschylus <\s>
<s> are you setting up to be a pindar you absurd little tom tit and fancy you have the strength and pinion which the theban eagle bear sailing with supreme dominion through the azure fields of air <\s>
<s> no my boy i think you can write a magazine article and turn a pretty copy of verses that's what i think of you <\s>
<s> said pen bouncing up and stamping his foot i'll show you that i am a better man than you think for <\s>

<s> laura is her name here is your health laura and carry a hod rather than ask for a shilling from home <\s>
<s> but how earn one <\s>
<s> how do i live think you <\s>
<s> on my younger brother's allowance pendennis <\s>
<s> i have secrets of my own my boy and here warrington's countenance fell <\s>
<s> i made away with that allowance five years ago if i had made away with myself a little time before it would have been better <\s>
<s> i have played off my own bat ever since <\s>
<s> i don't want much money <\s>
<s> when my purse is out i go to work and fill it and then lie idle like a serpent or an indian until i have digested the mass <\s>
<s> look i begin to feel empty warrington said and showed pen a long lean purse with but a few sovereigns at one end of it <\s>
<s> but how do you fill it <\s>
<s> i write said warrington <\s>
<s> i don't tell the world that i do so he added with a blush <\s>
<s> i do not choose that questions should be asked or perhaps i am an ass and don't wish it to be said that george warrington writes for bread <\s>
<s> but i write in the law reviews look here these articles are mine <\s>
<s> and he turned over some sheets <\s>
<s> i write in a newspaper now and then of which a friend of mine is editor <\s>
<s> and warrington going with pendennis to the club one day called for a file of the dawn and pointed with his finger silently to one or two articles which pen read with delight <\s>
<s> he had no difficulty in recognising the style afterwards the strong thoughts and curt periods the sense the satire and the scholarship <\s>
<s> i am not up to this said pen with a genuine admiration of his friend's powers <\s>
<s> i know very little about politics or history warrington and have but a smattering of letters <\s>
<s> i can't fly upon such a wing as yours <\s>
<s> but you can on your own my boy which is lighter and soars higher perhaps the other said good naturedly <\s>
<s> those little scraps and verses which i have seen of yours show me what is rare in these days a natural gift sir <\s>
<s> you needn't blush you conceited young jackanapes <\s>
<s> you have thought so yourself any time these ten years <\s>
<s> you have got the sacred flame a little of the real poetical fire sir i think and all our oil lamps are nothing compared to that though ever so well trimmed <\s>
<s> you are a poet pen my boy and so speaking warrington stretched out his broad hand and clapped pen on the shoulder <\s>
<s> arthur was so delighted that the tears came into his eyes <\s>
<s> how kind you are to me warrington <\s>
<s> i like you old boy said the other <\s>
<s> i was dev'lish lonely in chambers and wanted somebody and the sight of your honest face somehow pleased me <\s>
<s> i liked the way you laughed at lowton that poor good little snob <\s>
<s> and in fine the reason why i cannot tell but so it is young un <\s>
<s> i'm alone in the world sir and i wanted some one to keep me company and a glance of extreme kindness and melancholy passed out of warrington's dark eyes <\s>
<s> pen was too much pleased with his own thoughts to perceive the sadness of the friend who was complimenting him <\s>
<s> thank you warrington he said thank you for your friendship to me and and what you say about me <\s>
<s> i have often thought i was a poet <\s>
<s> i will be one i think i am one as you say so though the world mayn't <\s>
<s> is it is it the ariadne in naxos which you liked i was only eighteen when i wrote it or the prize poem <\s>
<s> warrington burst into a roar of laughter <\s>
<s> why young goose he yelled out of all the miserable weak rubbish i ever tried ariadne in naxos is the most mawkish and disgusting <\s>
<s> the prize poem is so pompous and feeble that i'm positively surprised sir it didn't get the medal <\s>
<s> you don't suppose that you are a serious poet do you and are going to cut out milton and aeschylus <\s>
<s> are you setting up to be a pindar you absurd little tom tit and fancy you have the strength and pinion which the theban eagle bear sailing with supreme dominion through the azure fields of air <\s>
<s> no my boy i think you can write a magazine article and turn a pretty copy of verses that's what i think of you <\s>
<s> said pen bouncing up and stamping his foot i'll show you that i am a better man than you think for <\s>
<s> in which the printer's devil comes to the door pen in the midst of his revels and enjoyments humble as they were and moderate in cost if not in kind saw an awful sword hanging over him which must drop down before long and put an end to his frolics and feasting <\s>
<s> his money was very nearly spent <\s>
<s> his club subscription had carried away a third part of it <\s>
<s> he had paid for the chief articles of furniture with which he had supplied his little bedroom in fine he was come to the last five pound note in his pocket book and could think of no method of providing a successor for our friend had been bred up like a young prince as yet or as a child in arms whom his mother feeds when it cries out <\s>
<s> warrington did not know what his comrade's means were <\s>
<s> an only child with a mother at her country house and an old dandy of an uncle who dined with a great man every day pen might have a large bank at his command for anything that the other knew <\s>
<s> he had gold chains and a dressing case fit for a lord <\s>
<s> his habits were those of an aristocrat not that he was expensive upon any particular point for he dined and laughed over the pint of porter and the plate of beef from the cook's shop with perfect content and good appetite but he could not adopt the penny wise precautions of life <\s>
<s> he could not give twopence to a waiter he could not refrain from taking a cab if he had a mind to do so or if it rained and as surely as he took the cab he overpaid the driver <\s>
<s> he had a scorn for cleaned gloves and minor economies <\s>
<s> had he been bred to ten thousand a year he could scarcely have been more free handed and for a beggar with a sad story or a couple of pretty piteous faced children he never could resist putting his hand into his pocket <\s>
<s> it was a sumptuous nature perhaps that could not be brought to regard money a natural generosity and kindness and possibly a petty vanity that was pleased with praise even with the praise of waiters and cabmen <\s>
<s> i doubt whether the wisest of us know what our own motives are and whether some of the actions of which we are the very proudest will not surprise us when we trace them as we shall one day to their source <\s>
<s> warrington then did not know and pen had not thought proper to confide to his friend his pecuniary history <\s>
<s> that pen had been wild and wickedly extravagant at college the other was aware everybody at college was extravagant and wild but how great the son's expenses had been and how small the mother's means were points which had not been as yet submitted to mr <\s>
<s> at last the story came out while pen was grimly surveying the change for the last five pound note as it lay upon the tray from the public house by mr <\s>
<s> warrington's pot of ale <\s>
<s> it is the last rose of summer said pen its blooming companions have gone long ago and behold the last one of the garland has shed its leaves and he told warrington the whole story which we know of his mother's means of his own follies of laura's generosity during which time warrington smoked his pipe and listened intent <\s>
<s> impecuniosity will do you good pen's friend said knocking out the ashes at the end of the narration i don't know anything more wholesome for a man for an honest man mind you for another the medicine loses its effect than a state of tick <\s>
<s> it is an alterative and a tonic it keeps your moral man in a perpetual state of excitement as a man who is riding at a fence or has his opponent's single stick before him is forced to look his obstacle steadily in the face and braces himself to repulse or overcome it a little necessity brings out your pluck if you have any and nerves you to grapple with fortune <\s>
<s> you will discover what a number of things you can do without when you have no money to buy them <\s>
<s> you won't want new gloves and varnished boots eau de cologne and cabs to ride in <\s>
<s> you have been bred up as a molly coddle pen and spoilt by the women <\s>
<s> a single man who has health and brains and can't find a livelihood in the world doesn't deserve to stay there <\s>
<s> let him pay his last halfpenny and jump over waterloo bridge <\s>
<s> let him steal a leg of mutton and be transported and get out of the country he is not fit to live in it <\s>
<s> dixi i have spoken <\s>
<s> give us another pull at the pale ale <\s>
<s> you have certainly spoken but how is one to live <\s>
<s> there is beef and bread in plenty in england but you must pay for it with work or money <\s>
<s> and who will take my work <\s>
<s> and what work can i do <\s>
<s> warrington burst out laughing <\s>
<s> suppose we advertise in the times he said for an usher's place at a classical and commercial academy a gentleman b a <\s>
<s> boniface college and who was plucked for his degree confound you cried pen <\s>
<s> wishes to give lessons in classics and mathematics and the rudiments of the french language he can cut hair attend to the younger pupils and play a second on the piano with the daughters of the principal <\s>
<s> p lamb court temple <\s>
<s> go on said pen growling <\s>
<s> men take to all sorts of professions <\s>
<s> why there is your friend bloundell bloundell is a professional blackleg and travels the continent where he picks up young gentlemen of fashion and fleeces them <\s>
<s> there is bob o'toole with whom i was at school who drives the ballynafad mail now and carries honest jack finucane's own correspondence to that city <\s>
<s> i know a man sir a doctor's son like well don't be angry i meant nothing offensive a doctor's son i say who was walking the hospitals here and quarrelled with his governor on questions of finance and what did he do when he came to his last five pound note <\s>
<s> he let his mustachios grow went into a provincial town where he announced himself as professor spineto chiropodist to the emperor of all the russians and by a happy operation on the editor of the country newspaper established himself in practice and lived reputably for three years <\s>
<s> he has been reconciled to his family and has succeeded to his father's gallypots <\s>
<s> hang gallypots cried pen <\s>
<s> i can't drive a coach cut corns or cheat at cards <\s>
<s> there's nothing else you propose <\s>
<s> yes there's our own correspondent warrington said <\s>
<s> every man has his secrets look you <\s>
<s> before you told me the story of your money matters i had no idea but that you were a gentleman of fortune for with your confounded airs and appearance anybody would suppose you to be so <\s>
<s> from what you tell me about your mother's income it is clear that you must not lay any more hands on it <\s>
<s> you can't go on spunging upon the women <\s>
<s> you must pay off that trump of a girl <\s>
